runs.comm: he has struck first ball! Big inswing for Kula, the keeper (Chandimal) was up to the stumps, the ball swerved back in and Davids was forward and was across the stumps trying to work it to the on side, hit low on the pads, you could see the leg stump
gets across and pushes it to the off side
streaky! Slip was deep and a touch too wide and the outside edge went past the big gap, no chance of stopping that
full and swinging in and he comes forward and defends
way too much inswing and it goes down the leg side, clips Chandimal's gloves and rolls to fine leg
good inswing again and he comes well forward and defends
swings back in and cramps him up for room, he pushes it down the track
right on target, on the middle stump and he goes right back and tucks it to mid-on
good length outside off and sort of keeps lower than expected, de Kock stabs it back to the bowler
de Kock makes room and cuts hard and Senanayake does brilliantly at backward point to fall to his right and stop it
testing inswinging yorker, quite quick too, de Kock tries to flick and hits it to the pads, nearly loses his balance
he makes room to slap this away and ends up hitting straight to mid-off
after five dot balls de Kock breaks free, this was pitched up and he scoops it over cover but doesn't time it well enough
this was a bit too wide outside off, didn't swing back in and left alone
he stays beside the line and pushes it to the off side
loses his balance there, this one keeps a touch low and du Plessis's bacl leg slips as he looks to drive through off, misses the edge
on the pads and he works it to the leg side
de Kock once again looks to break free by making room, pushes this one down to mid-off
he succeeds this time! Backs away, he has the width he was looking for and cuts hard wide of backward point
gets forward and pushes it to the off side
round the wicket and he comes well forward and pushes it softly to the off side
finds the gap, full and gives him width outside off and he drives this one crisply wide of cover for a boundary
softly pushes it to the on side
comes down the track and pushes it back to the bowler
stays back, waits for the turn and flicks it to the on side
fires that full and du Plessis chips down the track and drives him just wide of mid-off
he makes room again and doesn't succeed on the cut, ends up chopping it to the off side
good length on the pads and he shuffles and clips it down to short fine leg
this was banged in short and it's too high for de Kock to chase, he makes room and withdraws
he bowls it full on the off stump and he smashes it straight to mid-off
superb placement, he makes room to a full delivery moving away and he drives him wide of mid-off and cover
fires that full on the off stump and he makes room and thuds it down the ground wide of mid-off, didn't have to run, de Kock looking dangerous
continues round the wicket, he chips down the track and lofts it over midwicket
stays back and works it to the on side
clips it with the turn to midwicket
confident shout for an lbw! This one straightened and it hit his pads as he went forward, may have hit him outside the line of off stump
he clips this one towards square leg
gets forward and pushes this one wide of backward point
Faf has been felled! He is down, but not out. Hit on the groin, that stung, he tried to work it away to the on side and within seconds was flat on the pitch
good length outside the off stump and he stays back and punches it down to deep cover
this was a touch wide outside the off stump and he fetches it and pulls to midwicket
he makes room again and this time slaps it straight to sweeper cover
good improvisation! Du Plessis moves across his stumps, takes a good length ball from the off stump and clips it over short fine leg
this was too wide outside the off stump, he fetches it and gets an outside edge that clears the keeper and goes wide of slip
this was flatter and on the pads and he works it away down to short fine leg
doesn't take long for Mendis to strike! Looked like the leg break, he was forward and it skidded through and hit the base of the pads in front of the off stump
comes forward and pushes it to the off side
that looked really close at normal speed! It was the googly, du Plesses moved across, exposed his stumps as he looked to paddle it away, the umpire spotted the deflection off the glove, good umpiring
nudges it to the leg side
he makes room and cuts him wide of backward point and sweeper cover picks up
du Plessis really opening up here, it was the slower ball, du Plessis moved across and slogged him over deep midwicket, just cleared the rope
down the track and he gets an inside edge to the pads
takes pace off the ball and he mistimes the punch down the ground to long-on
short of a length but skids through and hits his thigh as he looks to pull, stifled appeal
Mathews' slower ones aren't working, outside off and du Plessis gets on his knee and lofts it, clears the sight screen
this was fuller and he drags this one down to long-on
fullish in length outside off and pushed down to long-on
goes back at the crease and punches it to the off side
good running! He works it down to deep midwicket and takes the first one hard, puts pressure on the fielder
good placement! Tossed up and he chips down the track and works it it down to wide long-on, deep midwicket gave up the chase
quicker delivery and he works it down to square leg
goes back and whips it down to long-on
down the track and he works it to midwicket
chips down the track and he drives to long-off
drops it short, looked like the googly, he cuts him hard to deep cover
he goes back and works it back to the bowler
smashed that down the ground, he chips down the track and lofts him over the bowler, he stretched out his hand but the ball had passed him like a bullet
chips down the track and shows the full face of the bat down to long-on
SA are certainly looking at 140 and beyond here, he chipped down the track and lofted a length ball down to long-on
pushes it to long-on and that's the captain's 50!
flatter delivery on the pads and he works it towards deep midwicket
down the track and checks his shot
looks unstoppable here, tossed up and du Plessis comes down the track and lofts nonchalantly over long-on, just clears the rope
works it down to midwicket
Thirimanne drops a sitter! Short delivery and he rocks back and pulls and finds deep midwicket, the fielder was behind it, had it covered and fluffed it
makes room and he fires this full and wide outside off and he doesn't offer a shot
full and wide outside off and he drives him down to sweeper cover
looking at an above par score here, this was dropped short down the leg side and Duminy pulls it firmly along the turf and down to deep square leg
looped around off stump and he drives him down to long-on
skids through, hits the pads as he looks to work it away
gets forward and drives him down to long-off
flatter one and he works it to midwicket
slides wide down the leg side
flatter one and he works it down to square leg
works it to short fine leg and he has to hurry the single, the throw to the keeper was wide
plays it across the line to the leg side
he makes a lot of room and mistimes the cut towards backward point
change of length doesn't work! Lakmal bowls this one full, on middle and leg, Duminy clears the front leg and chips it over wide long-on
tucks it to backward square leg
fires that full and wide outside the off stump and square drives it to backward point
pushes it softly towards point and sets off
chips down the track and checks his shot back to the bowler
down the track and he pushes it to the off side
down the track and he finds the gap between deep midwicket  and long-on
flatter one and he gets on his knee and sweeps him hard down to deep midwicket
gets forward and pushes it down to square leg, good running in the end
starts off round the wicket, bowls a low full toss and he makes room and mistimes it to deep midwicket
the improvisation looked really comical there! He moved a long way across and looked to paddle scoop it over fine leg, it was the leg cutter, ended up scooping it to third man
good inswinger, he makes room and ends up clipping it straight to his pads
pitched up wide outside off and he makes a hint of room and scoops that over extra cover, bisects two fielders in the deep
even Kula's not spared! Pitched up on middle and leg and he stays at the crease, gets forward and lofts him high over deep midwicket
tossed up outside off and he comes forward and drives
quicker one and he pushes it to extra cover
fires that down the leg side and he misses the nudge, takes an extra run
Mendis struggling with his line, down the leg side again
down towards fine leg and they do well to put pressure on the fielder
down the track and pushed hard towards deep midwicket and Senanayake does really well to slide and cut off what looked like a certain four
....and followed by sloppiness! Flatter delivery and he forces it down to long-off, it was in the air and Thisara had it covered and yet fumbled it
fuller delivery and he comes forward and clips it to midwicket
moves across and he tries to scoop it to third man and he misses it completely
this was pitched on a good length and he comes down the track and slaps it straight down the ground and wide of long-off
this is looking messy for SL! This was chipped over midwicket and the fielder running in didn't know whether to dive or stay back and field the ball, the ball beat him and rolled to the rope
he pushes it down to point
he moves a long way across the stumps and scoops it down to third man
fires that full and wide outside the off stump and he drives him down to deep point
finally some success for SL! A fine yorker, swings back in and hits the base of the stumps, ends a fine innings
he moves across and sweeps him straight to short fine leg, they hurry the single and there's a direct hit at the keeper's end and he's home
brings up his fifty! This was a waist high full toss and he clubs him over square leg, looks at the umpire hoping for a no-ball call
punches it towards long-off and SA post 163
